basic.description:
An examination and discussion of the economic and social history of Sub-Saharan Africa with a primary focus on the 19th and 20th centuries.
LEARNING HOURS    180 (36S;144P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: The Development of Capitalism in Africa

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C in 3.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
